resources.string: Looks like our servers have taken off on a vacation. Why don\'t you search again in some time? They\'ll be back and working pronto..

Working women have it hard enough – managing a 9 to 6 job along with family, friends, and the demand of staying fit and healthy is the last thing on the agenda. We all look for a job that gives us more than just a good salary – flexible working hours, innovation driven environment, medical insurance, the list is long.
But what if the place you work for gives you free benefits that help you stay fit? Yeah… you heard that right – a job that looks after you! At work!
Today’s companies need to attract and retain the best and they are upping their game to give employees a great workplace focused on professional AND personal development.
Let’s check out the Top 5 companies that believe in much more than just hard work!
Working women have it hard enough – managing a 9 to 6 job along with family, friends, and the demand…View More
It is a really nice app. Must try atleast once, if needed.
We are actively trying to improve SHEROES to better cater to your needs. Tap a star to rate. Leave us a note too, if you can!
We are sorry to see you go.

Every woman who makes a choice and makes it work for her is a SHERO.
SHEROES - a career destination for women professionals, committed to career success and individual work-life fit.
SHEROES welcomes women professional across levels, stages and sectors to pro-actively access the largest OpportunityScape for women.
There is a diverse and large range of opportunities to pick from - these include opportunities with women friendly employers, flex friendly formats, mompreneur programs, partnership programs and more.
The SHEROES Community gets access to career resources, information and community sharing. SHEROES Mentors engage actively to help women attain career success on their own terms.
SHEROES is committed to enhancing the quality and quantity of opportunities for women and investing in women
